item.title: What Does the Dollar Index (DXY) Have to Do with My Investments?
item.description: Discover how the Dollar Index (DXY) impacts your investments in stocks, crypto, and more. Explore whether a strong or weak dollar presents an opportunity or a crisis through the conflicting perspectives of Kurumi and Mikael, and learn to navigate the flow of global money to build your investment strategy.
